channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ibtana – WordPress Website Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ibtana – WordPress Website Builder

item.title: CVE-2021-25014|2024-08-03T19:49:14.530Z -- unknown -- ibtana%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20website%20builder
item.description: The Ibtana WordPress plugin before 1.1.4.9 does not have authorisation and CSRF checks in the ive_save_general_settings AJAX action, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscriber to call it and change the plugin's settings which could lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue.
